query: INSERT INTO AnimalTemperaments (animalId, temperamentId, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES ((SELECT id FROM Animals WHERE name = 'Coco' AND speciesId = (SELECT id FROM Species WHERE name = 'Dwarf Hamster')), (SELECT id FROM Temperaments WHERE name = 'Calm'), NOW(), NOW()), ((SELECT id FROM Animals WHERE name = 'Coco' AND speciesId = (SELECT id FROM Species WHERE name = 'Dwarf Hamster')), (SELECT id FROM Temperaments WHERE name = 'Scared'), NOW(), NOW()), ((SELECT id FROM Animals WHERE name = 'Ted'), (SELECT id FROM Temperaments WHERE name = 'Calm'), NOW(), NOW()), ((SELECT id FROM Animals WHERE name = 'Ted'), (SELECT id FROM Temperaments WHERE name = 'Scared'), NOW(), NOW()), ((SELECT id FROM Animals WHERE name = 'Coco' AND speciesId = (SELECT id FROM Species WHERE name = 'Jack-Russel')), (SELECT id FROM Temperaments WHERE name = 'Energetic'), NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE updatedAt = VALUES(updatedAt);
